title: Premiera OT - new to the scene, and how lovely!
content:
Love this one:

[http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9849/premiera2.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100619085236/http:/img194.imageshack.us/img194/9849/premiera2.gif "http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9849/premiera2.gif")

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typejockeys/premiera\_ot/?utm\_sou...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100619085236/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typejockeys/premiera_ot/?utm_source=November03&utm_medium=email&utm_content=Premiera&utm_term=em&utm_campaign=IndieQuality "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typejockeys/premiera\_ot/?utm\_source=November03&utm\_medium=email&utm\_content=Premiera&utm\_term=em&utm\_campaign=IndieQuality")

What are some similar fonts?

Cheers.
author: _Palatine_

comments.content: Figured out why I like it. It's a near-exact copy of Underware's Dolly. Some letters are indistinguishable.
It's a bit sharper than Dolly, don't you think ? More angles, especially in the Italic weight.
